This QR code cannot be processed.

You already enrolled with the identity %s for the service %s.
Cannot connect to the enrollment server. Please contact the website administrator.

Invalid enrollment server response. Please contact the website administrator.
Invalid response code (%s). Please contact the website administrator.
Invalid response protocol (%s). Please contact the website administrator.

Failed to store identity. Please contact support.

Invalid authentication QR code.
Invalid authentication response. Wrong PIN code? Try again.

Cannot connect to the authentication server.

Unable to log in. Invalid challenge.
Invalid response protocol (%s). Please contact the website administrator.

No identities found for identity provider, please enroll first.
Unknown
Wrong PIN
You supplied an incorrect PIN. You have %d attempts left. Please enter your PIN again. Check the verification icon for the last digit.
You have one last attempt left. If you enter an incorrect PIN again all the accounts on this device will be blocked.
Wrong Biometric
You supplied an incorrect biometric. You have %d attempts left. Please confirm your biometric again.
You have one last attempt left. If you supply an incorrect biometric again all the accounts on this device will be blocked.
Account blocked
This account can no longer be used.
This account has been blocked temporarily.
This account has been blocked for %d minutes.
Invalid challenge
The scanned QR code is invalid or has expired. Please try again.
Invalid request
The server doesn\'t recognize the login request. Please contact support.
Invalid account
You tried to log in with an invalid or unknown account. Please (re-)activate your account first.
